posts.name: TechWorker
posts.text: Tech companies are laying off thousands. Is this a correction after overhiring during the pandemic?

posts.name: RemoteLife
posts.text: Remote work boosts productivity and work-life balance. Companies should embrace it permanently!

posts.name: OfficeFirst
posts.text: Employees need to return to the office for better collaboration. Remote work is hurting innovation!

posts.name: AIThreat
posts.text: AI automation is eliminating jobs at an alarming rate. Governments must step in to regulate!

posts.name: AIInnovation
posts.text: AI is revolutionizing industries and creating new job opportunities. We should embrace the change!

posts.name: FairPayNow
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage is essential. Workers deserve fair pay in today’s economy!

posts.topic: The Downside of Raising Minimum Wage
posts.name: SmallBizOwner
posts.text: Increasing minimum wage forces small businesses to cut jobs. It hurts more than it helps!

posts.name: RecentGrad
posts.text: Finding a job as a new graduate is harder than ever. Do degrees even matter anymore?

posts.name: GigWorker
posts.text: Freelancing and gig work are becoming the norm. Is this the future of employment?

posts.name: HateMyJob
posts.text: Job burnout is at an all-time high. Work-life balance needs to be a bigger priority!

posts.topic: Skilled Trade Jobs Are in Demand
posts.name: TradeSkills
posts.text: Skilled trades pay well and don’t require a degree. More people should consider this path!

posts.name: EqualPay
posts.text: Women still earn less than men for the same work. Pay equity needs to be enforced!

posts.name: WorkForever?
posts.text: Retirement is becoming a luxury. People can’t afford to stop working at 65 anymore!

posts.name: UnionStrong
posts.text: Unions are more important than ever for protecting workers' rights and fair wages!

posts.name: NewCountryNewStart
posts.text: Immigrants contribute massively to the economy, but many still struggle to find work.

posts.name: RobotTakeover
posts.text: Self-checkouts, AI customer service, and automated warehouses—are human workers becoming obsolete?

posts.name: RuralJobs
posts.text: Job opportunities in rural areas are shrinking. What can be done to bring jobs back to small towns?

posts.topic: The Rise of AI Job Interview Screening
posts.name: AIInterviews
posts.text: AI-driven job interviews are biased and dehumanizing. Companies should rethink this hiring approach!

posts.name: BurnoutCulture
posts.text: Why are we still glorifying overwork? Employees need better work-life balance for mental health!

posts.topic: The Impact of Inflation on Wages
posts.name: WageCrisis
posts.text: Wages aren’t keeping up with inflation. Workers are struggling while corporations profit!
